task.title: Get Statistics for a Metric
task.shortdesc: You can get statistics for metrics via Euca2ools.

p.b: To get statistics for a metric:

info.codeblock: euwatch-get-stats -n NAMESPACE -s STAT1,STAT2,... [--dimensions KEY1=VALUE1,KEY2=VALUE2,...] [--start-time YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ] [--end-time YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ] [--period SECONDS] [--unit UNIT] [--show-empty-fields] [-U URL] [--region USER@REGION] [-I KEY_ID] [-S KEY] [--security-token TOKEN] [--debug] [--debugger] [--version] [-h] METRIC
